about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a world of dynamic adventures with Nice Pro! Play as stylish and athletic girls, overcome exciting levels and enjoy realistic physics.

The main goal in the game is to complete the levels without falling out of them. All levels are available to you at once, so that if you can't complete one, you can return to it later. You can also ignore the passage and fall, crash, develop towers and do whatever you want!

There are 3 levels available in the game, which can be downloaded immediately without having to go through each one separately.

New levels will be added to the game in the future.

Game Features

  • Challenging Levels: Go through unique and exciting levels, each one challenging you in a new way.

  • Realistic Physics: Enjoy incredibly realistic falls and collisions that add a special dynamic to the game.

  • Stylish characters: Play as girls in tight-fitting sportswear that accentuate their figure.

  • Dynamic music: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the game with the help of energetic and exciting music that will raise your adrenaline to a new level.

Are you ready to take on the challenge and become a true professional in Nice Pro? Join us and prove that you are able to overcome any obstacles!

name: Nice Pro?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Have you ever dreamt of a better version of Nice Pro? Younger, more beautiful, more perfect.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese
